long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shutterfly Address Book Exporter
Effortlessly Export Your Contacts from Shutterfly

With the Shutterfly Address Book Exporter, managing your contacts has never been easier. This user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to quickly and securely export your entire Shutterfly address book into a convenient CSV file, making it perfect for backing up, printing, or integrating with other applications.

How It Works:
Navigate to Shutterfly Address Book: Simply visit your address book on Shutterfly at https://www.shutterfly.com/addressbook/management.sfly#/contacts.

Click the 'Export' Button: Our extension seamlessly integrates into the Shutterfly interface. Once you're on your address book page, you'll find a new 'Export' button, conveniently placed next to the existing 'Import' button.

Instant Download: Clicking the 'Export' button triggers the extension to fetch your contact details in the background. It then swiftly converts this data into a CSV format and initiates an automatic download to your computer.

This extension is open source: https://github.com/rgarcia/shutterfly-address-book-exporter
